General.Name: Aisino Corp
General.Description: Aisino Co.Ltd. provides information security solutions in China and internationally. It also provides technical promotion and services of value-added tax anti-counterfeiting tax control system; technology development, transfer, consultation, training, and service; economic information consultation; application software and computer system services; system integration; aerospace information technology consulting; enterprise management; financial and taxation information consultation; data processing; data storage; tax agency and consulting; financial consulting; technical training; professional contracting; and engineering design for building intelligent system integration. In addition, it engages in wholesale and retail of computer software and hardware and consumables, communication equipment, office supplies and furniture, building intelligent engineering construction and equipment, projection equipment, monitoring equipment, and electronic products; and sale of value-added tax anti-counterfeiting tax control systems, computers and printers, tax control cash registers, commercial encryption products, and cultural and educational supplies. Further, it designs, produces, and sells information technology and products, computer software, hardware, and related technical advice and services; sells and services information technology equipment for banking systems; sells, repairs, and maintains tax-controlled cash registers, tax controllers, software and hardware of tax-controlled machines and tools, and accessories; purchases and sells metal materials, metal ropes, and wires and products. Additionally, it offers house leasing, catering management and equipment, personnel training, and conference services; and develops computer and peripheral equipment, intelligent mechanical and electrical products, special equipment for finance and taxation, and industrial automation control and bioengineering technology. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.
